sentences.en: "You must be expecting a young man," she teased.
sentences.cn: “你一定是在等哪位小伙子吧，”她揶揄道。

sentences.en: a young child
sentences.cn: 幼儿

sentences.en: A young man of his years needed to have a separate room.
sentences.cn: 他那个年纪的年轻人需要有个单独的房间。

sentences.en: A young man plunged from a sheer rock face to his death.
sentences.cn: 一名男青年从陡峭的岩壁上坠崖身亡。

sentences.en: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers.
sentences.cn: 一位被警察拦下的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的证件。

sentences.en: Fathers have the power to dominate children and young people.
sentences.cn: 父辈们有能力支配孩子们和年轻人的生活。

sentences.en: He is proud of his reputation as a seducer of young women.
sentences.cn: 他很得意自己“芳心猎手”这一名声。

sentences.en: He was soon one of the most celebrated young painters in England.
sentences.cn: 不久他就成了英格兰最负盛名的年轻画家之一。

sentences.en: He’s younger than me.
sentences.cn: 他比我小。

sentences.en: His handwriting, from earliest young manhood, was flowing and graceful.
sentences.cn: 他的字从小就写得流畅优美。

sentences.en: I could see the young boy struggling to free himself.
sentences.cn: 我看到小男孩正在奋力挣脱。

sentences.en: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.cn: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

sentences.en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
sentences.cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

sentences.en: She called her young son: "Here, Stephen, come and look at this!"
sentences.cn: 她喊她的小儿子：“喂，斯蒂芬，过来看看这个!”

sentences.en: The young man led Mark Ryle along a corridor.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻人领着马克·赖尔沿走廊而去。

sentences.en: To this end the young child is forever watchful.
sentences.cn: 这个年纪不大的孩子为此始终保持警惕。

sentences.en: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
sentences.cn: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

sentences.en: When I was young, I wanted to be a model.
sentences.cn: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.en: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.cn: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.en: Young people came from the four corners of the nation.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的年轻人都来到这里。

sentences.en: young trees
sentences.cn: 小树

words.tran_cn: 年轻地，无经验地；精神饱满地
青年；青春；年轻；青少年时期

phrases.tran_cn: 我小的时候；当我年轻的时候
n. 青年；青春活力；青年的思想等
n. 小姐；女士；未婚妻；女朋友

trans.tran_cn: 幼小的，年轻的，青年时代的
trans.tran_en: a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
